content: > you know the cold is not getting in with this impressive throw knit using bernat baby blanket pattern revised & updated on 09-29-22 **materials** bernat® baby blanket™ 6 balls 100 g/3 5 oz 78 m/86 yd baby blue 03202 or bernat® baby blanket™ 2 balls 300 g/10 5 oz 234 m/258 yd baby blue 04202 a 36 in \ 90 cm circular needle is recommended to accommodate the number of stitches cable needle ed note languages may be/have been available on labels cannot confirm at this time
